info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 9:32PM EST until February 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Michigan... Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. .Additional river rises are expected into Tuesday due to runoff from recent snowmelt and additional rainfall. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flooding is confined to mostly park land and golf courses. Leeper Park and Petro golf courses begin to flood. At 7.0 feet, Flooding is confined to park land and park roads. Some backyard flooding may occur in low lying residential areas near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 6.4 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
